document_data.name: Noyle
document_data.mainbody: '''Noyle''' was a patron of the [[Cutter's Dip]] in [[Yhaunn]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was a lecherous old man, who smoked a clay pipe.
document_data.Relationships: Noyle was on good terms with several of the unsavory patrons of Cutter's Dip, including the thugs [[Stag (bandit)|Stag]] and [[Drik]], [[Kor (Yhaunn)|Kor]], and [[Lahumbra Sashtyn]].
document_data.History: In [[Eleasis]] of [[1373 DR]], he was approached by the incognito [[Selûne|Selûnite]] [[priestess]] [[Feena Archwood]], who was attempting to investigate the local [[Temple of Shar (Yhaunn)|temple of Shar]]. She failed to get any useful information from him and was accosted by Stag and Drik, who turned him and the other patrons against her. The population of the Cutter's Dip had her at their mercy until she was rescued by [[Keph Thingoleir]].
